items.content_html: Nepali Datepicker React is a lightweight, highly customizable, and feature-rich datepicker component, specifically designed for handling Nepali dates in React.js applications. It offers seamless integration, intuitive user experience, and extensive configuration options.
items.title: tulsiojha/nepali-datepicker-react: Nepali Datepicker React is a lightweight, highly customizable, and feature-rich datepicker component, specifically designed for handling Nepali dates in React.js applications. It offers seamless integration, intuitive user experience, and extensive configuration options.
